properties.entry: SELECT sp.* FROM sc_real_product srp, sc_real_product_rel srpr, sc_amazon_account_product saap, sc_product_supplier sps, sc_supplier sp WHERE srp.id = srpr.REAL_ID AND srpr.SKU = saap.SKU AND sps.ASIN = saap.ASIN and sp.id = sps.supplier_id AND srp.REAL_SKU = '{@#{@#realSku#}' union SELECT sp.* FROM sc_real_product srp, sc_product_supplier sps, sc_supplier sp where sps.sku = srp.real_sku and sp.id = sps.supplier_id AND srp.REAL_SKU = '{@#{@#realSku#}'
INSERT INTO sc_real_product_supplier (REAL_SKU, SUPPLIER_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR ) VALUES ('{@#sku#}', '{@#supplierId#}', NOW(), '{@#loginId#}' )

INSERT INTO sc_supplier (ID, NAME, ADDRESS, CONTACTOR, PHONE, EMAIL, ZIP_CODE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, URL, QQ, MOBILE, FAX, MEMO, PRODUCTS ) VALUES ('{@#id#}', '{@#name#}', '{@#address#}', '{@#contactor#}', '{@#phone#}', '{@#email#}', '{@#zip_code#}', '{@#loginId#}', NOW(), '{@#url#}', '{@#qq#}', '{@#mobile#}', '{@#fax#}', '{@#memo#}', '{@#products#}' )
